title: The Joltshooter
content:
Location & Where to Find

Quest: Reward of Rescue the Grand Duke (Waukeen's Rest, other 2 possible rewards are The Sparky Points and The Spellsparkler)

The Joltshooter Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 310 Weight: 1.1 ID: 38b80bf8-9cf8-4495-8267-eb84c7779d0c

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Baldura
